= Cython notes =


== Testing installation==

Create a simple file *hello_world.pyx*:

{{{python
print("Hello world")
}}}

and Installation file *setup.py*

{{{python
from distutils.core import setup
from Cython.Build import cythonize

setup(
        ext_modules=cythonze("hello_world.pyx"))
}}}

Install the module with 

{{{bash
$ python setup.py build_ext --inplace
}}}

and test it with 

{{{python
import hello_world
}}}
